resources: • ONLINECrúbadán language data for Torres Strait Creole. Kevin Scannell. 2015. The Crúbadán Project. oai:crubadan.org:tcs

• Broken: The language spoken by Torres Strait islanders. Kennedy, Rodney J. 1985. Notes on Linguistics. oai:sil.org:3887
• Kriol and Torres Strait Creole: Where do they meet?. Sandefur, John R. 1990. Nungalinya Occasional Bulletin. oai:sil.org:4891

• ONLINELINGUIST List Resources for Creole, Torres Strait. Damir Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor); Malgorzata E. Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor). 2015-11-06. The LINGUIST List (www.linguistlist.org). oai:linguistlist.org:lang_tcs

• ONLINEWALS Online Resources for Broken. n.a. 2008. Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. oai:wals.info:bro
